Package org.turbogwt.core.http.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Factory<T>
    It is a simple class intended to create instances of some type.
    FluentRequest<RequestType,ResponseType>
    This type provides fluent style request building.
    FluentRequestSender<RequestType,ResponseType>
    This class provides fluent style request building and sending capabilities.
    HasUriParts
    A type that supports uri progressive construction.
    Registration
    Registration objects returned when any kind of binding is performed, used to deregister.
    RequestFilter
    An extension interface implemented by request filters.
    RequestSender<RequestType,ResponseType>
    Represents a class capable of submitting requests with content and receiving responses with content.
    ResponseFilter
    An extension interface implemented by response filters.
    Server
    Promotes communication with the backend.
    ServerConnection
    Represents a connection with server-side.
    UriBuilder
    Utility class for building URIs from their components.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptHeader  
    ContainerAsyncCallback<C extends Collection<T>,T>
    Super class of all callbacks intended to receive result as collection of objects.
    ContainerFactoryManager
    Manager of container (collection) factories.
    ContentTypeHeader  
    FilterManager
    A manager for RequestFilter and ResponseFilter.
    FluentRequestImpl<RequestType,ResponseType>
    Default implementation of fluent request.
    FormData
    Stores form params and values.
    FormData.Builder
    A builder of FormData.
    FormParam  
    Headers
    Stores the headers from a HTTP request/response.
    ListAsyncCallback<T>
    ContainerAsyncCallback for the List type.
    MultipleHeader
    HTTP Header with multiple values.
    MultipleParamStrategy
    Class that defines how multiple values will be appended to the URI along with its param name.
    MultipleParamStrategy.CommaSeparatedStrategy
    This class formats multiple parameters joining multiple values separated by comma.
    MultipleParamStrategy.RepeatedParamStrategy
    This class formats multiple parameters repeating the parameter name.
    QualityFactorHeader
    HTTP Header with relative quality factors.
    QualityFactorHeader.Value
    Represents a HTTP Header value with relative quality factor associated.
    Requestory
    This class is a configurable FluentRequest factory.
    ServerConnectionImpl
    Default implementation for ServerConnection.
    ServerImpl
    Default implementation of Server.
    SetAsyncCallback<T>
    ContainerAsyncCallback for the Set type.
    SimpleHeader
    Simple HTTP header with name and value.
    SingleCallback
    Callback to handle responses from request without error handling.
    UriBuilderImpl
    Default implementation of UriBuilder.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnsuccessfulResponseException
    Thrown to indicate that an HTTP request received a response with other status code then 2xx.
